column5: Hey all  Well since the ice just left all the lakes in the last week or so, we decided to go for some ice out lakers on Monday night and then for some Specks last night.  We new we would catch some fish, but the size and the numbers we did not expect. We started monday night and after the first pass over a point, in 4 fow, we start. After a little tussel this 4 lber of so is boated, quick snap of the camera and back to swim.   Shortly after, Jay get a tap and sets is hook into this solid fish.  This one was caught trolling through a weed bed in 8 fow.   We continued to troll up and down the shoreline and boated 3 more lakers, one of which was another laker about 8-9lbs, and these two scrappy lakers.  All lakers went back to swim, as it was just fun to get out and catch them.  We ended up going 5 for 7 that night.     The next night we decided to go into a back lake for some specks. Thinking we might get the odd speck that would be 12-14 inches, we started to troll again.  We started fishing at 6 and had the truck loaded by 830.  We caught 10 specks all from 14-20 inches and kept 4 for a nice meal tongiht.  The first of many   A fine beauty   My big one of the night   Jays 1 of many   Nice little female   A fine meal indeed.   Cheers,  Anders
Sweet report dude.  Some healthy looking trout there.  Good Job.  reefrunner
Dang that's a great report!!! Love those specks! Thanks for sharing.
Yup, I'm jealous!!!  Nice trout!!  It think I'll go try for some specks right now!! CYA.....  Thanks for the report!  Sinker
Nice job!  are those common size specks for your area?
Hey, great report and nice fish!
Thanks  For the most part thats the norm.  The 20 inchers are i think a little larger than average.  There are lots of nice speck lakes and rivers around here.  Cheers
Great scenery shots and fish porn... mmmm yesss..  Looks to be quite the remote location!  YOU are one of the lucky few dude.  Thanx for sharing!  HD
Awesome
great work!  excellent fish!
Very good report.  Nice Trout there.  Good stuff  Joey
Awesome fish  ....those specks remind me of the good old days back on the "Rock". Thanks for sharing  Jason
That's just FANTASTIC!!  Thanks for sharing.
Oh my goodness  those are some nice fish!  Thanks for posting
Nice specks.......soooooooooooooo jeaolus!!!
Very nice.. VERY nice !
great report, looks like a successful outing!
wow, beauty report man....those are some sweet looking fish
Well done, nice pictures. One more week before I try my hand at the same.  Dan
They've said it all above!
some dandy looking specks and lakers!! wish i was there!
Sweet!! Now you really have me excited for the long weekend..
